attributes.action: Corporate and Individual Tax and Financial Transparency
attributes.additional_details:
There is a proposal for a United Kingdom Corporate and Individual Tax and Financial Transparency Private Members Bill, that would require disclosure of various financial information by large companies. This would include the tax payments of the largest two hundred and fifty UK companies.

This would allow us to see if large companies are paying reasonable taxes.

My petition is designed to force Parliament to discuss this issue in connection with the bill.
